name: SeeMexic S.A.P.I de C.V.
description: Operator of an online travel agency intended to help customers in planning and exploring places during their tours. The company's agency helps find travel deals, and hotels and offers a subscription model and installment payment option for the trips, enabling travelers to pay in smaller amounts and also discover different regions in the country.
one_liner: Operator of an online travel agency intended to help customers in planning and exploring places during their tours. The company's agency helps find travel deals, and hotels and offers a subscription model and installment payment option for the trips, enabling travelers to pay in smaller amounts and also discover different regions in the country.
